feed.title: Web-Check Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Web-Check: Web Check V1
entry.content:
This is the stable version of Web Check, built as a React app with the backend made up of a series of lambda functions. Can be deployed to Vercel, Netlify or any Docker-compatible service. For self-hosting, the Docker container includes a Node server to surface all endpoints locally, as well as to serve up the frontend.

Version 1 is optimized for self-hosting. Future maintenance of the source for all V1.x.x versions will now be managed in our new GitHub org, at: https://github.com/xray-web/web-check-free

There are some big changes coming to Web Check, so backwards compatibility of the next version cannot be guaranteed. Stay tuned for some exciting updates!!
